msgSnippet: Hi Thanks, I wanted to know if the shell program called start.sh which starts the server started or not. My junit test has to check if it stars and also
messageBody:
Hi Thanks,

I wanted to know if the shell program called
"start.sh" which starts the server started or not. My
junit test has to check if it stars and also check the
log file.
============================================================
Code:

package junit.samples;
import junit.framework.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;

public class StartServer extends TestCase {
private Runtime rtime = null;


public StartServer(){
}
public void testProgramStarted(){

try{
rtime = Runtime.getRuntime();
Process child = rtime.exec("/bin/");
BufferedReader inCommand = new BufferedReader(new
InputStreamReader(child.getInputStream()));
String test = inCommand.readLine();
System.out.println("This is just a test"+" " +test);

}catch(Exception e){
System.out.println(e);
}


}

public static void main(String[] args)
{
StartServer s= new StartServer();
s.testProgramStarted();
junit.textui.TestRunner.run (StartServer());

// System.out.println("h");
}
}
